original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2497)@</color>  武將召喚五顆守護星辰，當武將體力歸零時，回復15%的體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2497)@</color> The military commander summons five guardian stars. When the military commander's physical strength returns to zero, he will recover 15% of his physical strength .
